column4: With Rhythym box (which i am using in Ubuntu ;-)), i have to wait aaaaages each time i start it whilst it re-finds my extensive mp3 library.. why does it not store this info and only look for new ones?
okay.. so wrt RhythymBox "thats just the way it is"?
I would guess Rhythmbox would show the tracks it already knows, then refresh them in the background. That's what Amaork does
